alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough; Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:18AM EDT until June 21 at 5:45AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Manatee County in west central Florida... South central Hillsborough County in west central Florida... * Until 545 AM EDT. * At 518 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Memphis, or near Palmetto, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Palmetto, Little Manatee River State Park, Ruskin, Greater Sun Center, Memphis, and Wimauma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
